application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - a) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new doors and architraves with details of mouldings in section (1:1). New doors shall be made of solid timber and hand painted; b) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new doors windows with details of mouldings in section (1:1). New doors shall be made of solid timber, with integral glazing bars and hand painted; c) Details of existing and new service runs plumbing / drainage / hot and cold water / heating pipework / extraction etc] including details of any associated alteration to fabric including alterations to joists, walling, external outlets, etc; d) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5 / 1:1) drawings of new cornices and skirting boards in the closet wing with details of materials and methods; e) Details of new chimney pieces and grates shown to scale in plan and elevation on the chimney breast along with details of proposed materials and finishes. New chimney pieces shall be appropriate in design, materials and size for the status of the room and the period of the house; and f) Sample of York stone pavers) of Listed Building consent LB/23/01941 (Reconfiguration of lower ground floor and internal amendments throughout. Alterations to fenestration on rear closet wing. Erection of masonry gate piers and installation of replacement metal gate and railings. Replacement of forecourt stone pavers and front stair finishes with level amendments)
